Room.Name: Khelleva Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along a narrow road, running through the Khelleva Estate.
Room.LongDescription: This small road runs southeast from the Khelleva Circle, located to the northwest. It passes by the Khelleva Mansion and the Khelleva Stables, to the east and south respectively. This small road was originally constructed to provide easy access to the Khelleva Mansion, but has since turned into a quick short-cut through town.
